description: Fundamental US English sounds in various categories for use in Graphic Novels and Composition

categories.description: The elements earth, fire, water and wind

children.description: The elements earth, fire, water and wind

categories.description: Sounds made by the human body

onomatopoeia: (Horn) Beep beep! Honk honk! Meep meep! Bwaaah!
Ka-chunk wheeeeeeeeeeeerrrrrrrrrt ka-chunk Klonk klonk klonk klonk
kerplunk (something heavy being dropped into water)
dot a dot dot (rain hitting window)
pitter patter pitter patter (rain hitting window)
rrrrrr tick a tick a tick a tick a rrrrrr
rat tat tat tat tat tat

categories.description: Smaller accessible list of sounds categorized by their location

onomatopoeia: Lightning Cracks when it strikes trees
Rain Gushes in torrents off the mountains
Streams Roar as they Rush of the hillsides
Thunder dooms from mountain to mountain
